document_data.name: Lyrannus Tantorn
document_data.daterefs: {{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|101|11}}{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|105|11}}
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Lyrannus Tantorn''' was a noble of [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was the head of House [[Tantorn]].
document_data.Personality: Lord Tantorn was a man of sophistication.
document_data.Relationships: He was the head of House [[Tantorn]]. Shortly before the Council of the Dragon, he became controlled by [[Manshoon]].
document_data.History: In the lead-up to the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, Lyrannus Tantorn was mind-controlled by the evil [[vampire]] [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]]. He was later slain during the event.
document_data.Reputation: Per the [[War Wizard of Cormyr]] [[Welwyn Tracegar]], Joreld Nurennanthur, wasn't much loss.{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|139|15}}
